title: Bro (Tamil)
short_cast: Pawan Kalyan, Sai Dharam Tej, Ketika Sharma, Brahmanandam, Tanikella Bharani, Rohini, Samuthirakani, Vennela Kishore, Subbaraju, Srinivasa Reddy, Sanjay Swaroop, Priya Prakash Varrier

desc: An overworked man who often fails to focus on his loved ones is given a chance to turn his life around when he meets Titan, the god of time.
